title: Restore student practice navigation and remove contributor single-question deletion UI

requirements.summary: Remove per-question deletion controls and confirmation flow from Contributor Panel while keeping create/edit and admin bulk cleanup intact.
acceptanceCriteria: Contributor Panel no longer shows any UI to delete a single question (no trash icon/button per question, no per-question delete dialog).
Creating and editing questions in Contributor Panel still works.
Admin-only bulk cleanup actions (if present) remain admin-gated and unchanged unless they depend on per-question delete UI.

file_operations.description: Remove all single-question deletion UI and wiring: delete/trash controls on question rows/cards, delete confirmation dialog, related component state (e.g., selected questionToDelete), and handler/mutation usage that triggers deleteQuestion for an individual question. Keep question create/edit flows unchanged. Keep admin-only bulk cleanup actions (e.g., delete all questions; delete by chapter+category) admin-gated and functional.

If ContributorPage was the only consumer of the single-question deletion hook/mutation, remove or refactor any now-unused exports/imports related to per-question deletion to prevent dead code and accidental UI reintroduction; ensure React Query keys and other contributor/admin hooks continue to function.

requirements.summary: Restore student practice navigation by aligning PracticePage parameter reading with the router path params and using search only for optional year filtering.
acceptanceCriteria: Starting practice from ChapterCategorySelectPage navigates to PracticePage with subject, chapterId, and category correctly populated (no 'Invalid Practice Session' error).

PracticePage reads subject/chapterId/category from the route parameters used by navigation (and reads year from search only when applicable), so the validation error is not triggered during normal navigation.
Practice sessions load questions successfully for Level 1, NEET PYQ, and JEE PYQ (including year selection when applicable).

file_operations.description: Update PracticePage to read required identifiers (subject, chapterId, category) from route params for '/practice/$subject/$chapterId/$category' (via TanStack Router params), and read only 'year' from validated search params. Adjust validation logic so normal navigation from ChapterCategorySelectPage does not trigger the 'Invalid Practice Session' error. Ensure PYQ flows use year filtering only when a year is provided, and non-PYQ flows ignore year. Keep progress key creation and question-fetch hooks consistent with the resolved params.

Verify navigation calls to PracticePage pass subject/chapterId/category as route params and only include 'year' in search when applicable (PYQ categories). Adjust only if needed to match the restored param-reading behavior in PracticePage.

Ensure the Practice route definition and search validation remain compatible with the restored behavior (route params for subject/chapterId/category; optional numeric 'year' in search). Update validateSearch typing/logic only if required to support PracticePage reading 'year' from search without requiring other fields in search.
